channel.title: Homes on Naveen Shankar Nagaraja
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Naveen Shankar Nagaraja

item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Hello Random Walker! I am a Machine Learning engineer, currently working on 3D perception at BMW Group. Previously, I was involved in deploying the first data driven component viz. Lane Change Prediction in series BMW cars (release 2018). Before joining BMW, I spent some wonderful years in Freiburg working on Video Segmentation, supervised by Prof. Thomas Brox. I’m interested in all aspects of Augmented Intelligence, especially using minimal data. Apart from being a developer in the autonomous driving project, I also supervise students on exciting topics.

item.title: Recent news
item.description: Supervising Miltiadis Kofinas (PhD student) on Path Prediction of Vulnerable Road Users, jointly with Prof. Efstratios Gavves (Apr’20) Workshop on Federated Learning for Autonomous Driving accepted at IEEE ITSC’20 (Mar’20) Invited as reviewer for ECCV’20 (Feb’20) DAC’20 paper accepted (details coming soon) (Feb’20) git-coco: user friendly git hook to add coauthors easily (link) (Feb’20) ICRA’20 paper on binary optimization accepted (details coming soon) (Jan’20)

item.title: Additional Professional Activities at BMW
item.description: Supervision: * Miltiadis Kofinas (PhD student) on Path Prediction of Vulnerable Road Users, jointly with Prof. Efstratios Gavves (Apr’20-) * Manoj Rohit Vemparala (PhD student) on Hardware Acceleration of Deep Networks, jointly with Prof. Walter Stechele (Dec’18-) * Tessa Heiden (PhD student) on Safe trajectory prediction (Aug’18-Mar’20) Reviewer: PAMI’16, CVIU’16, ECCV’20, BMVC’20.

item.title: Hobbies
item.description: Music: Senior grade violinist (Carnatic genre), under the tutelage of Vidushi Krishna Veni (disciple of seven string legend Vidwan R.R. Keshavamurthy) Competitive Sports: Badminton, Hapkido, Table Tennis Others: reading Indian and World history, watching documentaries (wildlife, scientific), animation and sci-fi movies (Marvel, DC :) )

item.title: Hobbies
item.description: Music: Senior grade violinist (Carnatic style), under the tutelage of Vidushi Krishna Veni (disciple of seven string legend Vidwan R.R. Keshavamurthy) Sports: Badminton, Hapkido (blue belt), Table Tennis
